orchestrator_extensible_attributes.description: Extensible attributes applied to all objects configured by provider

comment.description: Comment for the record; maximum 256 characters.

disable.description: Determines if the record is disabled or not. False means that the record is enabled.

dns_name.description: The name for an A record in punycode format.

extensible_attributes.description: Extensible attributes of A record (Values are JSON encoded).

ip_address.description: The IPv4 Address of the record.

ref.description: Reference id of A record object.

view.description: The name of the DNS view in which the record resides.

zone.description: The name of the zone in which the record resides.

comment.description: Comment for the record; maximum 256 characters.

disable.description: Determines if the record is disabled or not. False means that the record is enabled.

dns_name.description: The name for an Alias record in punycode format.

extensible_attributes.description: Extensible attributes of alias record (Values are JSON encoded).

name.description: The name for an Alias record in FQDN format.

ref.description: Reference id of alias record object.

view.description: The name of the DNS View in which the record resides.

zone.description: The name of the zone in which the record resides.

alias.description: The name for a CNAME record in FQDN format.

comment.description: Comment for the record; maximum 256 characters.

disable.description: Determines if the record is disabled or not. False means that the record is enabled.

dns_name.description: The name for the CNAME record in punycode format.

extensible_attributes.description: Extensible attributes of cname record (Values are JSON encoded).

ref.description: Reference id of cname record object.

view.description: The name of the DNS view in which the record resides.

zone.description: The name of the zone in which the record resides.

cidr.description: The network to which this fixed address belongs, in IPv4 Address/CIDR format.

comment.description: Comment for the fixed address; maximum 256 characters.

disable.description: Determines whether a fixed address is disabled or not. When this is set to False, the fixed address is enabled.

extensible_attributes.description: Extensible attributes of fixed address (Values are JSON encoded).

grid_ref.description: Ref for grid needed for restarting services.

hostname.description: This field contains the name of this fixed address.

ip_address.description: The IPv4 Address of the fixed address.

mac.description: The MAC address value for this fixed address.

match_client.description: The match_client value for this fixed address.

network_view.description: The name of the network view in which this fixed address resides.

range_function_string.description: Range start and end string for next_available_ip function calls.

ref.description: Reference id of fixed address object.

block.description: Grid member associated with fixed address.

code.description: The code of the DHCP option.

use_option.description: Only applies to special options that are displayed separately from other options and have a use flag.

vendor_class.description: The name of the space this DHCP option is associated to.

block.description: An array of DHCP option structs that lists the DHCP options associated with the object.

comment.description: Comment for the record; maximum 256 characters.

enable_dns.description: When false, the host does not have parent zone information.

extensible_attributes.description: Extensible attributes of host record (Values are JSON encoded).

hostname.description: The host name in FQDN format.

network_view.description: The name of the network view in which the host record resides.

ref.description: Reference id of host record object.

view.description: The name of the DNS view in which the record resides.

zone.description: The name of the zone in which the record resides.

configure_for_dhcp.description: Set this to True to enable the DHCP configuration for this host address.

mac_address.description: MAC address associated with IP address.

network.description: Network for host record in CIDR notation (next_available_ip will be retrieved from this network).

range_function_string.description: Range start and end string for next_available_ip function calls.

use_for_ea_inheritance.description: Set this to True when using this host address for EA inheritance.

block.description: IPv4 addresses associated with host record.

cidr.description: The network address in IPv4 Address/CIDR format.
